SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.client.connection

Class ClientRMI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.client.connection.ClientRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client
public class ClientRMI extends Object implements Client
Implementation of the Client interface using Remote Method Invocation (RMI) for game interaction. Manages client-server communication, game actions (joining, card selection), and message sending.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientRMI

      public ClientRMI(String hostName, int portNumber, ViewInterface view)
      Initializes a new instance of the ClientRMI class. This constructor attempts to connect to a remote game controller via RMI and starts a heartbeat sender.
      Parameters:
      hostName - the hostname of the remote registry.
      portNumber - the port number on which the remote registry is running.
      view - the ViewInterface instance used for interacting with the client view.

  • Method Details

    • CreateGame

      public void CreateGame(int nPlayers, String nickname)
      Creates a new game with the specified number of players and the given nickname. This method initializes the client model, invokes the remote game controller to create a game, and updates the view accordingly.
      Specified by:
      CreateGame in interface Client
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - the number of players for the game.
      nickname - the nickname of the player creating the game.

    • JoinGame

      public void JoinGame(String nickname)
      Allows a player to join an existing game with the specified nickname. This method initializes the client model, invokes the remote game controller to add the player, and updates the view accordingly.
      Specified by:
      JoinGame in interface Client
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player joining the game.

    • PickColor

      public void PickColor(String color)
      Allows a player to pick a color for their game piece. This method checks if the color can be picked and then assigns the color to the player.
      Specified by:
      PickColor in interface Client
      Parameters:
      color - the color the player wants to pick.

    • ChooseStartingCardSide

      public void ChooseStartingCardSide(String face)
      Allows a player to choose a starting card side. This method checks if the player can select the starting card face and then performs the selection.
      Specified by:
      ChooseStartingCardSide in interface Client
      Parameters:
      face - the side of the starting card the player wants to choose.

      Parameters:
